name: MRSATestsByCultureAndIdentificationMethod
title: MRSA (Tests by Culture and Identification Method)
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains codes for laboratory test names associated with detecting the presence of Methicillin-resistant Staphylococcus aureus by culture or identification),(Data Element Scope: Laboratory tests names that were ordered or observed.),(Inclusion Criteria: MRSA culture),(Exclusion Criteria: none)
